trans-unit.source: Represents a digital signature for an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument" />.

Use <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature> instead of <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> when you work with an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature>而不是<xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature>當您使用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> is not [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]-aware, and does not guarantee that all parts in an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] document are fully signed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Packaging.PackageDigitalSignature> 不是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]-感知，並不保證所有組件中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]文件會完整簽署。

trans-unit.source: For more information about digital signatures, see the MSDN article *Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions* available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN 文章：*開放式封裝慣例的數位簽章架構*位於[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] see the *XML Paper Specification (XPS)* available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]看到*XML Paper Specification (XPS)*下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761)。

trans-unit.source: The associated digital signature for the package.
The associated package.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature" /> class.
Gets a value that indicates whether changing the properties of the document invalidates the digital signature.
<see langword="true" /> if changing the properties of the document invalidates the signature; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果變更文件的屬性會導致無效的簽章;否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_guid](~/includes/tla2sharptla-guid-md.md)] of the signature.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)] of the signature.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_guid](~/includes/tlasharptla-guid-md.md)]簽章。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature.Id%2A> property to display and update signature information.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature.Id%2A>屬性來顯示和更新的簽章資訊。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the signer's X.509 certificate is contained in the document <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
<see langword="true" /> if the X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded in the document <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌在文件<see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />，否則<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數位簽章和憑證的詳細資訊，請參閱 > 一節 3.3 數位簽章中*開放式封裝慣例*規格下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the digital signature is invalidated if someone else signs the package.
<see langword="true" /> if the signature is invalidated if an additional digital signature is applied; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果簽章無效，如果套用到其他的數位簽章。否則， <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The signature origin restriction is set by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `restrictions` parameter set to exclude the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions.SignatureOrigin> part.
trans-unit.target: 簽章原點限制由設定<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`restrictions`參數設定為排除<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions.SignatureOrigin>組件。

trans-unit.source: If a document is to be signed by more than one person, the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions.SignatureOrigin> part needs to be excluded from the signature when the document is first signed.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件是由多人，簽署<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions.SignatureOrigin>部分需要先簽署文件時，會排除簽章。

trans-unit.source: (Exclusions are specified in the `restrictions` parameter of the call to <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>.) If the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions.SignatureOrigin> part is not excluded, any additional signatures invalidate the signature of the first signer.
trans-unit.target: (排除項目中指定`restrictions`參數呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>。)如果<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigSigPartAlteringRestrictions.SignatureOrigin>的組件不在排除、 任何其他的簽章失效的第一個簽署的簽章。

trans-unit.source: For more information on the Core Properties and Signature Origin parts, see Chapter 3 of the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關核心屬性和簽章來源組件的詳細資訊，請參閱第 3 章的*開放式封裝慣例*規格下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)] string that identifies the signature type.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_url](~/includes/tla2sharptla-url-md.md)]識別簽章類型的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default signature type is <see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設簽章的類型是<see cref="F:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigC14NTransformUrl" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the encrypted hash value of the signature.
A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that contains the encrypted hash value of the signature.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.Byte" />陣列，包含簽章的加密雜湊值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the document sequence reader for the signed document sequence.

An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" />; or <see langword="null" /> if not all valid [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] parts have been signed in the document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentSequenceReader" />; 或<see langword="null" />如果所有有效[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)]在文件組件已登入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.
The X.509 certificate of the signer; or <see langword="null" /> when there is no certificate embedded in the document package.
trans-unit.target: X.509 憑證簽署者;或<see langword="null" />時沒有內嵌在文件封裝中的憑證。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on digital signatures and certificates, see Section 3.3 Digital Signatures in the *Open Packaging Conventions* specification available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關數位簽章和憑證的詳細資訊，請參閱 > 一節 3.3 數位簽章中*開放式封裝慣例*規格下載[ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255 ](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=71255)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the date and time when the signature was created.
The date and time when the pages, document, or document sequence was signed.
trans-unit.target: 已簽署的日期和時間頁面中，當文件或文件順序。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> 是會根據的電腦所在的簽章已進行的系統時間。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> is not a "secure Time Stamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDigitalSignature.SigningTime%2A> 不是 「 安全時間戳記 」，而不是來自受信任的時間戳記授權單位。

trans-unit.source: A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.
trans-unit.target: 安全時間戳記必須取得並套用到受信任的時間戳記授權單位。

trans-unit.source: Verifies the document digital signature against an X.509 certificate.
Verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.Package" />.
One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult" /> enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.

This overload method verifies the document digital signature against the X.509 certificate embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個多載方法驗證文件數位簽章對 X.509 憑證內嵌<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: The certificate of authenticity for the signer.
Verifies the document digital signature against a specified X.509 certificate.
One of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Packaging.VerifyResult" /> enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
Verifies an X.509 certificate.
Verifies the X.509 certificate embedded in the package.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式必須決定哪些旗標不可或缺的驗證憑證。

trans-unit.source: Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
trans-unit.target: 某些憑證的驗證可能會需要網際網路連線。

trans-unit.source: The X.509 certificate of the signer is embedded by the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A> method when called with the `embedCertificate` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 簽署者的 X.509 憑證內嵌<xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument.SignDigitally%2A>方法呼叫時`embedCertificate`參數設定為`true`。

trans-unit.source: A certificate of authenticity.
Verifies the specified X.509 certificate.
A bitwise combination of the enumeration values that specify the result of the verification attempt.
Your application will need to decide what flags are critical for verifying certificates.
trans-unit.target: 您的應用程式必須決定哪些旗標不可或缺的驗證憑證。

trans-unit.source: Some certificate verifications may require Internet connectivity.
trans-unit.target: 某些憑證的驗證可能會需要網際網路連線。
